duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quantitative analysis for Wholesale and Retail Distribution Centers to support growth and cost reductions.
Transform data into actionable items and provide clarity into the data.
Ensure connectivity of financial information back to P&L.
Produce daily, weekly, monthly reports including key metrics, financial results, and variance reporting for Warehousing and Distribution Centers in the US.
Track KPIs, scorecards, and drive cost reduction initiatives.
Assist in budgeting, planning, and forecasting processes, working cross-functionally to influence stakeholders.
Prepare monthly operating reviews for senior management communicating operational and financial performance.
Track business KPIs and prepare recurring financial reports in partnership with accounting and business stakeholders.
Identify opportunities for automation within the FP&A organization.
Work in collaboration with other analysts in the team and make recommendations to reporting needs.
Ability to adjust within a fast-paced work environment.
Work in collaboration with accounting and corporate FP&A team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field (Master's preferred)
